short_description: High bacteria levels were documented at the Spanish Fort (Malbis) WWTP outfall, threatening safe recreation downstream in Fish River. This project focuses on monitoring, enforcement leverage, and sustained compliance.
case_for_change_summary: Recent inspections and Baykeeper investigation indicate bacteria exceedances at the plant outfall. The project goal is to drive full NPDES compliance and prevent recurrence to protect public health and Fish River recreation and ecology.
